import useFetch from "../../hooks/useFetch"; import "./featured.css"; const API_BASE_URL = process.env.REACT_APP_PROXY; // Common entry point const Featured = () => { const { data, loading, error } = useFetch( `${API_BASE_URL}/hotels/countByCity?cities=berlin,madrid,london`); return (
{loading ? ( "Loading please wait" ) : ( <>

Berlin

{data[0]} properties

Madrid

{data[1]} properties

London

{data[2]} properties

)}
); }; export default Featured;
